alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:54PM MDT until July 20 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 353 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Truckton, or 39 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Forder. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
